title: 1927 Dodge Brothers Victory Coupe
item_description:
1927 Dodge Brothers Victory Coupe

Note: The sale of this item is subject to the Seller's confirmation.

Specifications

  • Year: 1927
  • Make: Dodge Brothers
  • Model: Victory
  • VIN: M42993
  • License: HV642L
    • Expiration Date: 7/18/2002
    • PNO-REGISTRATION DEFERRED
  • Odometer Reads: 2,863.9
  • Key: Available
  • Body Style: Coupe
  • Engine: Flathead 6 cyl
  • Fuel Type: Gasoline
  • Transmission: 3-speed manual transmission
  • Tire Size: 6.5 -19, Rims 15

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: Tan/Brown
  • Doors: Two Door

Interior

  • Interior Material: Cloth
  • Interior Color: Brown

Note: Certificate of Title, Transfer Form, Statement of Facts, Death Certificate, and Transfer without Probate will be mailed 1-2 weeks following auction removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV.
